text.config.islandcustomized.title: Island Customized Configuration
text.config.islandcustomized.option.auto: Automatically sends a message an MCCi game ends.
text.config.islandcustomized.option.batt: Title that appears on your screen when your team wins.
Title that appears on your screen when your team loses.
text.config.islandcustomized.option.skyB: Title that appears on your screen when your team wins.
text.config.islandcustomized.option.hitw: Title that appears on your screen when you're the last person standing / time runs out.
text.config.islandcustomized.option.tgtt: Title that appears on your screen when you finish 1st.
text.config.islandcustomized.option.park: Title that appears on your screen when you finish 1st.
text.config.islandcustomized.category.de:
These options are meant for development purposes. You shouldn't touch them unless you know what you're doing.
And we mean like you *really* know what you're doing.
text.config.islandcustomized.option.deve:
TreasureMap is an online database that stores message information for MCCi, managed by us.
This allows us to adapt to changes in MCCi's message formats without you having to update the mod.
§c§lIf this URL is invalid, bad things will happen!
Disables some checks. If you're not a developer working on this mod, don't bother playing with this :)
text.config.islandcustomized.option.fetc:
§lWhen to fetch data from TreasureMap?

§lSTARTUP - Fetch data once when the game starts.
§lMCCI_JOIN - Reloads data whenever you join the server. Allows you to update your database without restarting.
